MDX allows for certain things beyond what markdown is capable of. Content here
will discuss using those features to augment or modify the default content
layout.
You can declare frontmatter in your
files to provide specific metadata for the theme to use.
: Main page title: search results and SEO
: if true, page will be excluded from search

---
title: Markdown
description: Usage instructions for the Markdown component
keywords: 'ibm,carbon,gatsby,mdx,markdown'
hiddenFromSearch: true
---

The theme has a remark for processing straight quotes, into 'smart' quotes (''). However, this plugin isn't able to process text used in custom MDX components. 
When using quotes in custom components, content authors should manually use
to adhere to the Example Content content guidelines.
component in order to render a unique title for a single page. This is particularly useful for including line breaks at a specific location.
You still need to provide a regular string title to the frontmatter for search, navigation, and the HTML header title to work.
